name: Micro Monster Factory
description:
Play as one of two mad scientists who have started a lab in the sewers. Snatch dead creature bodies, Buy body parts, and compete to create the most hideously cute monster your evil genius mind comes up with.

2 players

20-30 minutes 

8+

Object: Be the first player to create 4 monsters to dominate the sewers and eventually the world!

Mechanics: worker placement, Area movement

This version is made for the 2021 1-card contest. The players share 1 card in which they get to fill in their monster parts, creations and abilities.
